Title: System Initialization
Description: System shall initialize all peripherals on startup

Title: System Clock
Description: System clock shall be configured to 72MHz using HSE and PLL

Title: LED Control
Description: System shall provide LED toggle functionality

Title: Delay Function
Description: System shall provide millisecond delay functionality

Title: System Tick
Description: System shall increment tick counter every millisecond

Title: Error Handling
Description: System shall enter safe state on error

Title: Error Loop
Description: Enter infinite loop in error state

Title: Main Loop
Description: Main function shall initialize system and run main loop

Title: GPIO Init
Description: GPIO driver shall support pin initialization

Title: GPIO Write
Description: GPIO driver shall support pin write operations

Title: GPIO Read
Description: GPIO driver shall support pin read operations

Title: Read State
Description: Read pin state from input register

Title: GPIO Toggle
Description: GPIO driver shall support pin toggle operations

Title: UART TX
Description: UART driver shall support byte transmission

Title: UART RX
Description: UART driver shall support byte reception

Title: UART String
Description: UART driver shall support string transmission

Title: Timer Start
Description: Timer driver shall support start operation

Title: Timer Stop
Description: Timer driver shall support stop operation

Title: Timer Count
Description: Timer driver shall support count read operation

Title: Sensor Read
Description: System shall read sensor data at 100Hz

Title: Sensor Validate
Description: System shall validate sensor readings are within range

Title: Sensor Calibrate
Description: System shall apply calibration to sensor readings

Title: Sensor Fault
Description: System shall detect sensor fault conditions

Title: Sensor Process
Description: System shall process sensor data and update state
